item.title: Graydon’s Grand Old Party: The Making of Hollywood’s Biggest Bash
item.description: Before he became editor of Vanity Fair, Graydon Carter was famously banished from Swifty Lazar’s Oscar-night fete. Then he seduced the town, took over the event and turned it into one of the most cove
